testsuite.name: As a user i have be able to login so that i can see home screen

testcase.name: As a user i can login
As a user i cant login because i input invalid email
As a user i cant login because i input invalid password
As a user i cant login because i input invalid email and password
As a user i cant login because no input anything
As a user i can login
